chest.name: Blood Frenzy
chest.desc: Each time you deal Bleed damage, you gain 3 rage.

chest.name: Flagellation
chest.desc: Gain a 25% bonus to Physical damage done for 12 sec after activating Bloodrage or Berserker Rage.

chest.name: Raging Blow
chest.desc: A ferocious strike that deals 100% weapon damage, but can only be used while Enrage, Berserker Rage, or Bloodrage is active.

chest.name: Warbringer
chest.desc: Your Charge, Intercept, and Intervene abilities are now usable while in combat and in any stance, and will all remove movement impairing effects when activated.

glove.name: Devastate
glove.desc: While you are in Defensive Stance and have a shield equipped, Sunder Armor also deals 100% weapons damage, increased by 10% per application of Sunder Armor already on the target.

glove.name: Endless Rage
glove.desc: You generate 25% more Rage from all damage you deal.

glove.name: Single-Minded Fury
glove.desc: While dual-wielding, your Physical damage and movement speed are increased by 10%.

glove.name: Victory Rush
glove.desc: Instantly attack the target causing 151 damage and healing you for 10% of your maximum health. Only useable within 20 sec after you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor.

glove.name: Quick Strike
glove.desc: A reckless instant melee attack with your two-handed weapon dealing 51-84 physical damage. This ability benefits from and triggers all effects associated with Herioc Strike.

leg.name: Consumed by Rage
leg.desc: Enrages you and grants you a 25% melee damage bonus for 12 sec or up to a maximum of 12 swings after you exceed 80 Rage.

leg.name: Frenzied Assault
leg.desc: While wielding 2-handed weapons, your attack speed is increased by 20%.

leg.name: Furious Thunder
leg.desc: Thunder Clap now increases the time between attacks by an additional 6% and can be used in any stance.
